subtitle: since 1970 there have been more than 90
telescopes placed in orbit by NASA in
the esa to bring the universe closer to
us
and with the James Webb Telescope that
launched on December 25th 2021
we entered a new era of discovery
this telescope is the largest and most
powerful one ever built and its daunting
task is to find the first galaxies that
formed in the early universe and appear
through Dusty clouds to see stars
forming planetary systems
we mainly understand the theory that
unites Quantum with gravity yet but
every Discovery brings us one step
closer to that ultimate goal of
unification
to run our time on this planet we've
pushed the boundaries of existence by
